projects.title: Kuromi's world
projects.description: This project utilizes Three.js to implement various features including model importing, distance-based fog effects, object selection, skybox rendering, and more. Initial loading time may vary depending on your hardware.

projects.title: PickUp App
projects.description: App that allows users to find and create pickup games of any sport in their area. (e.g. soccer, basketball, baseball, football, spikeball) (This project is current private. I am asking my group member to change it to public)
